Author: OkieNope
Text: Not sure what my body fat is but I do weight training with a trainer twice a week at first I thought maybe it's muscle but I don't think it's that  realistic to be gaining  _.x lb steadily every day and have it be muscle all of a sudden :/

Author: AstrologyBou
Text: Just a guess but if you’re undermuscled and aren’t including your bodyfat percentage then your BMR would be lower than calculated.  Unless bodyfat percentage is included and the formula accounts for it, the calculator just uses a default number. The result probably isn’t representative of someone who has restricted to an underweight BMI.
